CmdLine: apt-get update     && curl -sL https://deb.nodesource.com/setup_8.x | bash -     && apt-get install -y nodejs jpegoptim     && npm install -g npm     && npm install -g bower     && npm install -g gulp     && echo '{ "allow_root": true }' > ~/.bowerrc     && curl -sS https://dl.yarnpkg.com/debian/pubkey.gpg | apt-key add -     && echo "deb https://dl.yarnpkg.com/debian/ stable main" | tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/yarn.list     && apt-get update     && apt-get install yarn libelf1
Commands.Name: run

CmdLine: apt-get update && apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends         cmake         g++         libgmp-dev         openssl         libssl-dev         libpcre3-dev         make
